items.name: aurelia-binding
items.description: A modern databinding library for JavaScript and HTML.

items.name: aurelia-bootstrapper
items.description: Sets up the default configuration for the aurelia framework and gets you up and running quick and easy.

items.name: aurelia-dependency-injection
items.description: A lightweight, extensible dependency injection container for JavaScript.

items.name: aurelia-dialog
items.description: A dialog plugin for Aurelia.

items.name: aurelia-event-aggregator
items.description: A lightweight pub/sub messaging system for app-wide or per-object loosely coupled events.

items.name: aurelia-fetch-client
items.description: A simple client based on the Fetch standard.

items.name: aurelia-framework
items.description: The aurelia framework brings together all the required core aurelia libraries into a ready-to-go application-building platform.

items.name: aurelia-history
items.description: An abstract module which specifies the interface for history implementations used by a router.

items.name: aurelia-history-browser
items.description: An implementation of the Aurelia history interface based on standard browser hash change and push state mechanisms.

items.name: aurelia-i18n
items.description: A plugin that provides i18n support.

items.name: aurelia-loader
items.description: An abstract module which specifies an interface for loading modules and view templates.

items.name: aurelia-loader-default
items.description: A default implementation of the loader interface compatible with system.js and require-based loaders.

items.name: aurelia-logging
items.description: A minimal but effective logging mechanism with support for log levels and pluggable log appenders.

items.name: aurelia-logging-console
items.description: A console log appender for the Aurelia logging library.

items.name: aurelia-metadata
items.description: Utilities for reading and writing the metadata of JavaScript functions.

items.name: aurelia-pal
items.description: Aurelia's platform abstraction layer (PAL).

items.name: aurelia-pal-browser
items.description: The browser-specific implementation of Aurelia's platform abstraction layer.

items.name: aurelia-path
items.description: Utilities for path manipulation.

items.name: aurelia-route-recognizer
items.description: A lightweight JavaScript library that matches paths against registered routes. It includes support for dynamic and star segments and nested handlers.

items.name: aurelia-router
items.description: A powerful client-side router.

items.name: aurelia-task-queue
items.description: A simple task queue for the browser that enables the queuing of both standard tasks and micro tasks.

items.name: aurelia-templating
items.description: An extensible HTML templating engine supporting databinding, custom elements, attached behaviors and more.

items.name: aurelia-templating-binding
items.description: An implementation of the templating engine's Binding Language abstraction which uses a pluggable command syntax.

items.name: aurelia-templating-resources
items.description: A standard set of behaviors, converters and other resources for use with the Aurelia templating library.

items.name: aurelia-templating-router
items.description: An implementation of the RouteLoader interface for use with the router module. Also contains a custom element that allows the templating engine to display the current route.

items.name: aurelia-testing
items.description: A collection of helpers for testing Aurelia apps and components.

items.name: aurelia-validation
items.description: Validation for Aurelia applications
